    /**
     * Create a @@modelName@@
     *
     *
     * @Post("/store")
     *
     * @Versions({"v1"})
     * @Transaction({
     *      @Request(@@apiRequest@@),
     *      @Response(200, body=@@apiResponse@@),
     *      @Response(500, body={"message": "Error occurred while saving @@modelName@@"})
     * })
     */
